languages.text: {n}Ей вторит шипение из вокса:{/n} "Я допускаю возможность цепной реакции, вызванной случайной аварией. Корабль стар, подобное возможно. Но я отдаю должное бдительности Леди Зауэрбэк — в нынешний час она уместна".

{n}Her voice is followed by a hiss from the vox-caster:{/n} "It might have been a chain reaction caused by an accidental failure. The ship is old — that sort of thing can happen. But I commend Mistress Sauerback's vigilance. It is appropriate at this hour."
languages.original_text: {n}Ей вторит шипение из вокса:{/n} "Я допускаю возможность цепной реакции, вызванной случайной аварией. Корабль стар, подобное возможно. Но я отдаю должное бдительности Леди Зауэрбэк — в нынешний час она уместна".

traits.locale_text: {n}Her voice is followed by the vox hissing:{/n} "I admit the possibility of a chain reaction caused by an accidental failure. The ship is old, that sort of thing can happen. But I commend Lady Sauerback's vigilance, it is appropriate at this hour."

{n}Her voice is followed by the vox hissing:{/n} "I admit the possibility of a chain reaction caused by an accidental failure. The ship is old, that sort of thing can happen. But I commend Lady Sauerback's vigilance, it is appropriate at this hour."

{n}Her voice is followed by a hiss from the vox:{/n} "I admit the possibility of a chain reaction caused by an accidental failure. The ship is old — that sort of thing can happen. But I commend Lady Sauerback's vigilance; it is appropriate at this hour."

{n}Her voice is followed by a hiss from the vox:{/n} "I admit the possibility of a chain reaction caused by an accidental failure. The ship is old — that sort of thing can happen. But I commend Lady Sauerback's vigilance; it is appropriate at this hour."

{n}Her voice is followed by a hiss from the vox-caster:{/n} "It might have been a chain reaction caused by an accidental failure. The ship is old — that sort of thing can happen. But I commend Mistress Sauerback's vigilance. It is appropriate at this hour."

{n}Her voice is followed by a hiss from the vox-caster:{/n} "It might have been a chain reaction caused by an accidental failure. The ship is old — that sort of thing can happen. But I commend Mistress Sauerback's vigilance. It is appropriate at this hour."

languages.text: {n}A su voz le sigue un siseo desde el voco amplificador:{/n} «También puede deberse a una reacción en cadena producida por un fallo accidental. La nave es vieja y estas cosas pasan, pero la vigilancia de la maestra Sauerback es encomiable y apropiada dadas las circunstancias».
languages.original_text: {n}Her voice is followed by a hiss from the vox-caster:{/n} "It might have been a chain reaction caused by an accidental failure. The ship is old — that sort of thing can happen. But I commend Mistress Sauerback's vigilance. It is appropriate at this hour."

traits.locale_text: {n}A su voz le sigue un siseo desde el voco amplificador:{/n} «También puede deberse a una reacción en cadena producida por un fallo accidental. La nave es vieja y estas cosas pasan, pero la vigilancia de la maestra Sauerback es encomiable y apropiada dadas las circunstancias».

languages.text: {n}彼女の声の後に、音声通信送受信装置がシューと音を立てる。{/n} 「偶然故障して、連鎖反応が起きたのかもしれません。古い船なので…そういうことが起きてもおかしくありません。しかし、ザウアーバック嬢の警戒心には恐れ入りました。タイミングも抜群です」
languages.original_text: {n}Her voice is followed by a hiss from the vox-caster:{/n} "It might have been a chain reaction caused by an accidental failure. The ship is old — that sort of thing can happen. But I commend Mistress Sauerback's vigilance. It is appropriate at this hour."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女の声の後に、音声通信送受信装置がシューと音を立てる。{/n} 「偶然故障して、連鎖反応が起きたのかもしれません。古い船なので…そういうことが起きてもおかしくありません。しかし、ザウアーバック嬢の警戒心には恐れ入りました。タイミングも抜群です」

languages.text: {n}她话音刚落，通讯器里就传来了嘶嘶的声音。{/n}“这有可能是由于意外故障引发的连锁反应。这艘船毕竟已经太老旧了，这种事情也是有可能发生的。不过，苏尔贝克女士的警惕态度值得赞赏，这种时候确实应该保持警惕。”
languages.original_text: {n}Her voice is followed by a hiss from the vox-caster:{/n} "It might have been a chain reaction caused by an accidental failure. The ship is old — that sort of thing can happen. But I commend Mistress Sauerback's vigilance. It is appropriate at this hour."

traits.locale_text: {n}她话音刚落，通讯器里就传来了嘶嘶的声音。{/n}“这有可能是由于意外故障引发的连锁反应。这艘船毕竟已经太老旧了，这种事情也是有可能发生的。不过，苏尔贝克女士的警惕态度值得赞赏，这种时候确实应该保持警惕。”

languages.text: {n}Auf ihre Stimme folgt ein Zischen aus dem Vox-Transmitter:{/n} "Es könnte eine Kettenreaktion gewesen sein, ausgelöst durch einen technischen Defekt. Das Schiff ist alt — so etwas kann passieren. Aber ich gratuliere Herrin Sauerback zu ihrer Wachsamkeit. Sie ist in dieser Stunde angeraten."
languages.original_text: {n}Her voice is followed by a hiss from the vox-caster:{/n} "It might have been a chain reaction caused by an accidental failure. The ship is old — that sort of thing can happen. But I commend Mistress Sauerback's vigilance. It is appropriate at this hour."

traits.locale_text: {n}Auf ihre Stimme folgt ein Zischen aus dem Vox-Transmitter:{/n} "Es könnte eine Kettenreaktion gewesen sein, ausgelöst durch einen technischen Defekt. Das Schiff ist alt — so etwas kann passieren. Aber ich gratuliere Herrin Sauerback zu ihrer Wachsamkeit. Sie ist in dieser Stunde angeraten."

languages.text: {n}L'émetteur vox grésille :{/n} « C'est peut-être le résultat d'une réaction en chaîne provoquée par une défaillance accidentelle. Ce vaisseau n'est plus tout jeune, ce genre de choses peut arriver. Mais je salue la vigilance de maîtresse Sauerback. Vu la situation, c'est on ne peut plus approprié. »
languages.original_text: {n}Her voice is followed by a hiss from the vox-caster:{/n} "It might have been a chain reaction caused by an accidental failure. The ship is old — that sort of thing can happen. But I commend Mistress Sauerback's vigilance. It is appropriate at this hour."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'émetteur vox grésille :{/n} « C'est peut-être le résultat d'une réaction en chaîne provoquée par une défaillance accidentelle. Ce vaisseau n'est plus tout jeune, ce genre de choses peut arriver. Mais je salue la vigilance de maîtresse Sauerback. Vu la situation, c'est on ne peut plus approprié. »

languages.text: {n}Sesini, voksyayardan gelen bir cızırtı takip ediyor.{/n} "Kaza kaynaklı bir arızanın sebep olduğu zincirleme bir reaksiyon da olabilir. Gemi çok eski, böyle bir şey şaşırtıcı olmaz. Ama Sauerback Hanım'ın ihtiyatını takdir ediyorum. İçinde bulunduğumuz durum için son derece uygun."
languages.original_text: {n}Her voice is followed by a hiss from the vox-caster:{/n} "It might have been a chain reaction caused by an accidental failure. The ship is old — that sort of thing can happen. But I commend Mistress Sauerback's vigilance. It is appropriate at this hour."
